description: Adds two matrices of same size
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: MatrixAddition.c
Compile: gcc MatrixAddition.c -o MatrixAddition
Run: ./MatrixAddition

How to Run:
Save: MatrixTranspose.c
Compile: gcc MatrixTranspose.c -o MatrixTranspose
Run: ./MatrixTranspose

description: Checks whether a number is Armstrong number
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: Armstrong.c
Compile: gcc Armstrong.c -o Armstrong
Run: ./Armstrong

How to Run:
Save: GCD.c
Compile: gcc GCD.c -o GCD
Run: ./GCD

How to Run:
Save: LCM.c
Compile: gcc LCM.c -o LCM
Run: ./LCM
